c.DAO

Interface CompanyDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompanyDBDAO

    public interface CompanyDAO
    Interface that allows the application to perform all essential methods that involve communication with the database table Company. The communication channel for this interface is the JavaBean Company

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createCompany(Company company)
      Add Company to DB
      java.util.Collection<Company> getAllCompanies()
      Get all companies from database.
      Company getCompany(java.lang.Long id)
      Get the company with the given ID from database.
      Company getCompany(java.lang.String name)
      Overloading the get Method for the login in the FACAED Get the company with the given NAME from database.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCoupons(Company company)
      Get all coupons associated with the given company.
      boolean login(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String password)
      Verifies a company user credentials.
      void removeCompany(Company company)
      Remove company from company table of database, if company with the given ID exists.
      void updateCompany(Company company)
      Change information of specific Company.

    • Method Detail

      • createCompany

        void createCompany(Company company)
            throws DAOException
        Add Company to DB
        Parameters:
        company - Company object to add to database
        Throws:
        DAOException - When connection with the database failed.

      • removeCompany

        void removeCompany(Company company)
            throws DAOException
        Remove company from company table of database, if company with the given ID exists.
        Parameters:
        company - The company to remove.
        Throws:
        DAOException - When connection with the database failed.

      • updateCompany

        void updateCompany(Company company)
            throws DAOException
        Change information of specific Company.
        Parameters:
        company - The company.
        Throws:
        DAOException - When connection with the database failed.

      • getCompany

        Company getCompany(java.lang.Long id)
            throws DAOException
        Get the company with the given ID from database.
        Parameters:
        id - The requested company's ID.
        Returns:
        The company from database with the given ID.
        Throws:
        DAOException - When company with the given ID haven't been found, or connection with the database failed.

      • getCompany

        Company getCompany(java.lang.String name)
            throws DAOException
        Overloading the get Method for the login in the FACAED Get the company with the given NAME from database.
        Parameters:
        name - The requested company's NAME.
        Returns:
        The company from database with the given ID.
        Throws:
        DAOException - When company with the given NAME haven't been found, or connection with the database failed.

      • getAllCompanies

        java.util.Collection<Company> getAllCompanies()
                                       throws DAOException
        Get all companies from database.
        Returns:
        All companies from database.
        Throws:
        DAOException - When connection with the database failed.

      • getCoupons

        java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCoupons(Company company)
                                 throws DAOException
        Get all coupons associated with the given company.
        Parameters:
        company - The company for which to search coupons for.
        Returns:
        All coupons associated with the given company.
        Throws:
        DAOException - When connection with the database failed.

      • login

        boolean login(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String password)
       throws DAOException
        Verifies a company user credentials.
        Parameters:
        name - The company name.
        password - The company password.
        Returns:
        True - if verification resulted true.
        False - if verification resulted false.
        Throws:
        DAOException - When connection with the database failed.
